name: Ask Charles
description:
A Scratch-based remake of my first ever Flash game, involving Charles, a grumpy elevator guy.

"Ask Charles" is a web toy that works in a vein similar to the classic Magic 8-ball. All you have to do is think of a yes-or-no question, then click on the ASK button to hear Charle's two cents on the matter.

Charles appears in the webcomic A Train's World, currently in reruns on DeviantArt.
